p: LOD values, the calculation of which were based on the power of detecting E-tRNA, were 153.94 (95% CI 76.59–701.91) copies/reaction for Allplex and 84.12 copies/reaction (95% CI 47.96–260.14) for PowerChek, respectively. LOD value for Real-Q, the calculation of which was based on the power of detecting SARS-RNA was 80.60 (95% CI 26.78–43,614.20) copies/reaction, respectively ( Figure 2). Detection sensitivity per sample volume determined via Allplex, PowerChek, and Real-Q were 4.81 × 10 3/mL, 4.21 × 10 3/mL, and 4.03 × 10 3/mL, respectively.
